original_title: Girls, Guns and Gangsters: Shinji Somai & Sailor Suit & Machine Gun
overview: A documentary featuring actor Akira Emoto, film scholar Chika Kinoshita, Somai biographer Tatsuya Kimura and Sailor Suit assistant director Koji Enomoto discussing the making of the film, its director and its legacy.
title: Girls, Guns and Gangsters: Shinji Somai & Sailor Suit & Machine Gun
